name: Amexio D3-chart donut
description: An   D3-chart donut chart that is rendered within the browser using SVG .Displays tips when hovering over points.

properties.name: colors
properties.description: Sets color to D3 donut chart

properties.name: legend
properties.description: Sets legend to D3 donut chart

legend.name: onLegendClick()
legend.description: It will fire only on click on Legend Click in D3 donut chart .

chartevent.name: onChartClick()
chartevent.description: It will fire only on click on chart in D3 donut chart .
